this is what i like , easy and good.


for the next person who downloads.

1.run setup, and enter serial when asked.
2.restart computer when asked.
3.run setup again after reboot..

after install , open control center and add the other serials for the addons.

done.
The serial # don't work, don't waste your time and download.
